author: COMSOL
description: This example uses the P1 method to solve a 3D radiative transfer problem in an emitting, absorbing, and linear-anisotropic scattering finite cylindrical medium. The calculated incident radiation and heat fluxes are compared to the results obtained with the highly accurate S6 Discrete Ordinates method used in the corresponding model. They show good agreement for large optical thickness by much lower computational costs.
label: cylinder_participating_media_p1.mph
name: root
